title: Auction records and sale documents
dataVerified: Buyer/seller names (may be anonymized), auction house, hammer price
dataVisibleAfterVerification: Shows the issuer domain and the responder text (e.g., "Valid ID" or "Denied").
rationale: Domain binding verifies auction house (Christie's, Sotheby's, etc.). Prevents fake sale records. Formal documents suitable for OCR. Permanent price history.
